About_Description: The Saudi Industrial Development Fund is organizing the “Industry Hackathon” competition in its third edition under the slogan “Your creativity has an impact,” with the aim of supporting and developing the national industry. This hackathon provides the opportunity for creative citizens and residents of the Kingdom to present creative solutions to the challenges facing national manufacturers, and to discover innovative solutions that contribute to advancing industrial development in the Kingdom.
Sustainability_Text: This path aims to design and develop environmental solutions or products that contribute to enhancing environmental sustainability and reducing environmental pollution.
Production_Text: This track specializes in employing innovative ideas in the production processes of companies and factories with the aim of increasing production efficiency and reducing waste.
Design_Text: This path is concerned with innovating or developing products using modern technologies that contribute to improving and facilitating the user experience.
Team_Size: The team must consist of 2 to 5 members led by a Saudi.
Idea: The idea is compatible with the values ​​and policies of the religion and the kingdom.
Prototype: Presenting a prototype of the idea.
Age_Size: The participant must not be less than 18 years old.
Leader_Nationality: The team leader must be at least a Saudi national. The participant must be over 18 years old.
Awards_Text: First place winners in all tracks will receive cash prizes.
